tag_list: cto, technologist, big-data, predictive-analytics, behavioral-analytics, online, distributed-processing
overview: Nick Gonzalez is a seasoned technologist and leader in the video game and advertising industries. He realized at the young age of 8, that he had a unique ability to visualize complex problems and program computers. Nick specializes in large scale distributed architecture, communications, and big data processing. On his free time, Nick writes LISP code, listens to industrial and hard electronic music, enjoys reading books on philosophy, but mostly spends time with his wife and kids as much as possible.
